services.description1: I develop using Java Spring Boot for the backend and React for the frontend. I use Redux Toolkit for state management, and I manage styling with MUI and styled-components. I am capable of handling both SQL and NoSQL databases.
services.description2: For real-time responsive design, I use and manage each actual device connected locally through the network. This is a method aimed at faster development.
services.description3: I use communities and searches to create creative logic and write test codes. I do this every day to improve my coding skills.

about.title: About
about.description: I have worked on Backend development with Java Salesforce, and on Frontend development with React and TypeScript. For state management, I have used Redux.js, and for styling, Styled-components and Material-UI. These experiences have made me proficient in FullStack development and have improved my project management and team collaboration skills according to the Agile methodology. Through these experiences, I continue to grow and progress.

jumbotron.title: Hello, My name is
jumbotron.description1: I'am a developer Full Stack Spring/React
